markdownRemark.html:
This is simply incredible - China’s Tianhe 1A is now the world’s fastest supercomputer.  Built using Xeons and nVidia Tesla systems, they churn out 2.5 petaflops.

This is government funded - what I cant understand is, how come the Indian govt is so incompetent.

‘Though it will be a real-time system with Windows software…’

Enough said.

frontmatter.title: China's nVidia GPU supercomputer is world's fastest
